name: Untitled Card Battler
description:
LOUD SOUND WARNING! Tried to turn it down but Love2D not cooperating

CONTROLS
Arrow Keys - D-Pad
C - A Button
X - B Button
Space - Start Button

The Game
Play as Blue Boy, Red Guy, or Yella Fella! Earn upgrades and use your wits (and your cards) to best 5 enemies!

Made with LÖVE, aka Love2D

Music and Sounds: Musical Enjoyment

Created for the Lospec Jam 1
